msagent - package msagent
 
MSAgent - Class in msagent
This class represents a Microsoft agent and can be used to create and control an Microsoft agent character.
MSAgent(Character) - Constructor for class msagent.MSAgent
Constructor; instantiates a new MSAgent object.
msagent.characters - package msagent.characters
 
MSAgentActionEvent - Class in msagent
The MSAgentActionEvent objects are passed as arguments to an MSAgentListener.
MSAgentActionEvent(int, MSAgent, Object...) - Constructor for class msagent.MSAgentActionEvent
Constructor; initializes a new MSAgentActionEvent.
msagentenvironment - package msagentenvironment
 
MSAgentEnvironment - Class in msagentenvironment
This environment can be used to control the Microsoft Agents.
MSAgentEnvironment() - Constructor for class msagentenvironment.MSAgentEnvironment
Constructor; initializes all the collections of this class.
MSAgentException - Exception in msagent
The MSAgentException is thrown when an error occurred while controlling the MSAgents.
MSAgentException() - Constructor for exception msagent.MSAgentException
Default constructor; simply creates an empty MSAgentException.
MSAgentException(String) - Constructor for exception msagent.MSAgentException
Constructor with a specified message.
MSAgentListener - Interface in msagent
Every object that implements this interface will receive a notification when an Microsoft Agent action was performed.
